glsa.title: ImageMagick: EXIF buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: ImageMagick contains an error in boundary checks when handling EXIF information, which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: ImageMagick is a collection of tools to read, write and manipulate images in many formats.

description.p: ImageMagick fails to do proper bounds checking when handling image files with EXIF information.

impact.p: An attacker could use an image file with specially-crafted EXIF information to cause arbitrary code execution with the permissions of the user running ImageMagick.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ImageMagick users should upgrade to the latest version:
